product.title: DBT vB Post Templates
product.description: Allow users to create post templates and easily use them when posting.

code.installcode: $db->query("CREATE TABLE `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "posttemplate` ( `pid` int(15) NOT NULL auto_increment, `userid` int(15) NOT NULL default '0', `parentid` int(15) NOT NULL default '0', `type` enum('category','template') NOT NULL default 'category', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` mediumtext NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pid`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) Type=MyISAM");
code.uninstallcode: $db->query("drop table `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "posttemplate`"); $db->query("alter table `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "usergroup` drop vbpt_permissions");

code.installcode: $db->query("ALTER TABLE `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "usergroup` ADD `vbpt_permissions` INT( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '6';"); $db->query("ALTER TABLE `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "posttemplate` ADD `global` TINYINT( 2 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `title`;");
